title: How to Pin Someone on Zoom

steps.title: Host a Zoom meeting.
steps.content: Host a Zoom meeting. Open the client that you can find in your Start menu or Applications folder and click New Meeting . You need at least 2 participants to be able to pin videos.

steps.title: Click … .
steps.content: Click … . You'll see this three-dot menu icon appear in the top right corner of the video's thumbnail when you mouse over it.

steps.title: Click Pin.
steps.content: Click Pin . Repeat this process to pin more people and their videos. You can pin up to 9 videos. To remove a pin, click Remove Pin in the upper left corner of the video.

steps.title: Host a Zoom meeting.
steps.content: Host a Zoom meeting. Open the app that you can find on one of your Home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching, and tap New Meeting . You need at least 2 participants to be able to pin videos.

steps.title: Swipe left to enter Gallery View.
steps.content: Swipe left to enter Gallery View. You'll see the videos of all the meeting's participants displayed.

steps.title: Double-tap the video you want to pin.
steps.content: Double-tap the video you want to pin. That video will automatically be pinned and visible to everyone in the meeting. Double-tap the pinned video to remove the pin and return to Active Speaker View.
